= Keith and Taylor }} 'Robert Quinlan "Bob" Costas' (born March 22, 1952) is an
American sportscaster, on the air for NBC Sports television since the early
1980s. He has been prime-time host of a record 9 Olympic games. He also does play-by-
play for MLB Network as well as hosting an interview show called Studio 42 with
Bob Costas.
categories: College basketball announcers in the United States
